TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Control extends System.Windows.FrameworkElement
.class public auto ansi Control extends System.Windows.FrameworkElement

summary.span: 表示用户界面 (UI) 元素的基类，这些元素使用 来定义其外观。

span.span: Represents the base class for user interface (UI) elements that use a to define their appearance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是添加到应用程序中的许多控件的基类。The class is the base class for many of the controls you add to an application. 类定义极少的行为; 虽然可将添加 到应用程序，但添加从继承的控件（ 如或）更常见 。The class defines very little behavior; while it is possible to add a to your application, it is far more common to add a control that inherits from , such as a or . 属性（即 ）指定的外观 。The property, which is a , specifies the appearance of the . 如果要更改控件的外观，但保留其功能，则应考虑创建一个新的， 而不是创建新类。If you want to change the appearance of a control but retain its functionality, you should consider creating a new instead of creating a new class. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [样式设置和模板化](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating)。For more information, see [Styling and Templating](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating). 如果要创建具有自定义行为的控件并允许其他人自定义其外观，则控件可以从 类继承并定义 。If you want to create a control with custom behavior as well as allow others to customize its appearance, your control can inherit from the class and define a . 如果要扩展现有控件的行为，可以从继承自的类继承 。If you want to extend the behavior of an existing control, you can inherit from a class that inherits from . 在 您的应用程序中不显示的，设置以下属性不起作用，除非 显式引用它们：A that does not have a is not visible in your application, and setting the following properties has no effect unless the references them explicitly: - - - - - - - - - - 使用这些属性的常用方法是将中的元素绑定 到属性。A common way to use these properties is to bind an element in the to the property. 例如，如果希望控件根据属性的值更改颜色 ，可以将中元素的某些属性绑定 到 。For example, if you want your control to change color according to the value of the property, you can bind some property of an element in the to the . 使用 [TemplateBinding 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension) 将控件的属性绑定到中的元素 。Use the [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension) to bind properties on a control to an element in the . 重写属性的元数据 ，并将其默认设置为 `true` 。 overrides the metadata of the property and sets its default to `true`. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [依赖项属性概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-properties-overview)For more information, see [Dependency Properties Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-properties-overview)

span.span: WPF Controls Gallery Sample

The size of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认的控件排列仅排列第一个视觉对象。The default control arrangement arranges only the first visual child. 不应用任何转换。No transforms are applied.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::Brush ^ Background { System::Windows::Media::Brush ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::Brush ^ value); };
member this.Background : System.Windows.Media.Brush with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个用于描述控件背景的画笔。

span.span: Gets or sets a brush that describes the background of a control.

value.span: 用于填充控件背景的画笔。

span.span: The brush that is used to fill the background of the control.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 属性仅适用于控件的静止状态。The property applies only to the resting state of a control. 控件的状态发生更改时，控件的默认样式指定其外观。The default style of the control specifies its appearance when the state of the control changes. 例如，如果在 上设置属性 ，则只有未按下或禁用此按钮时，该按钮才具有该值。For example, if you set the property on a , the button has that value only when it is not pressed or disabled. 若要创建具有更高级的背景自定义的控件，必须定义该控件的样式。If you want to create a control that has a more advanced customization of the background, you must define the control's style. 此属性仅影响其模板使用 属性作为参数的控件。This property only affects a control whose template uses the property as a parameter. 在其他控件上，此属性不会有任何影响。On other controls, this property has no impact. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置控件的背景属性。The following example shows how to set the background property of a control. [!code-xaml[ControlProps#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#11)] [!code-csharp[ControlProps#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ControlProps#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps/VisualBasic/Pane1.xaml.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示一个模板，该模板启用触发器以便在按下按钮时更改按钮的背景。The following example shows a template that enables a trigger to change the background of a button when it is pressed. [!code-xaml[BackgroundProp_snip#ButtonTemplate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BackgroundProp_snip/CS/page1.xaml#buttontemplate)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double FontSize { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.FontSize : double with get, set

span.span: Gets or sets the font size.
The size of the text in the .
The default is .
The font size must be a positive number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性仅影响其模板使用 属性作为参数的控件。This property only affects a control whose template uses the property as a parameter. 在其他控件上，此属性不会有任何影响。On other controls, this property has no impact. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , | ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *double**double* 值的字符串表示形式 。A string representation of a value. 这被解释为与设备无关的单位， (1/96th 每英寸) 度量。This is interpreted as a device-independent unit (1/96th inch) measurement. 字符串不需要显式包含小数点。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. 例如，的值 `1` 是可接受的。For example, a value of `1` is acceptable. " 属性值" 一节中提到的相同范围限制在此处适用。The same range restrictions that are mentioned in the Property Value section apply here. *qualifiedDouble**qualifiedDouble* 前面所述的 *双精度* 值，后面跟有以下单元声明字符串之一： `px` 、 `in` 、 `cm` 、 `pt` 。A *double* value as previously described that is followed by one of these unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`. `px` (默认) 是与设备无关的单位， (每个单位 1/96th 每英寸) `px` (default) is device-independent units (1/96th inch per unit) `in` 为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` 为厘米;1cm = = (96/2.54) px`cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` 为点;1pt = = (96/72) px`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px **注意** 在许多情况下，double 可以设置为 "Auto"，但 如果设置为 "auto"，则不会呈现。**Note** In many cases a double may be set to "Auto," but a does not render if set to "Auto". ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置控件的字体大小属性。The following example shows how to set the font size property of a control. [!code-xaml[ControlProps#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#14)] [!code-csharp[ControlProps#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ControlProps#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps/VisualBasic/Pane1.xaml.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将某个控件包含在 Tab 导航中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a control is included in tab navigation.

value.span: 如果将该控件包含在 Tab 导航中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control is included in tab navigation; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 为 `false` ，则从选项卡导航中排除该控件。If is `false`, the control is excluded from tab navigation. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性，以及如何测试控件是否包含在 tab 导航中。The following example shows how to set the property and how to test whether a control is included in tab navigation. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseDoubleClick As MouseButtonEventHandler

summary.span: 在双击或多次单击鼠标按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a mouse button is clicked two or more times.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管此路由事件似乎是通过元素树执行冒泡路由，但实际上它是一个直接路由事件，每个事件都由元素树逐个引发 。Although this routed event seems to follow a bubbling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised along the element tree by each . 如果 `true` 在事件处理程序中将属性设置为，则将在 设置为的情况下发生沿路由的后续事件 `false` 。If you set the property to `true` in a event handler, subsequent events along the route will occur with set to `false`. 这是控件使用者的高级事件，当用户双击控件并处理应用程序中的事件时，这些用户希望获得通知。This is a higher-level event for control consumers who want to be notified when the user double-clicks the control and to handle the event in an application. 当等于2时，要处理鼠标双击的控件作者应使用该事件 。Control authors who want to handle mouse double clicks should use the event when is equal to two. 这将导致的状态 在元素树中的另一个元素处理事件时适当地传播。This will cause the state of to propagate appropriately in the case where another element in the element tree handles the event. 类定义 和 事件，而不是对应的单击事件。The class defines the and events, but not corresponding single-click events. 若要查看用户是否已单击该控件一次，请处理该 事件 (或其对应的) 之一，并检查 属性值是否为1。To see if the user has clicked the control once, handle the event (or one of its counterparts) and check whether the property value is 1. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |委托Delegate|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将事件处理程序附加到 事件。The following example shows how to attach an event handler to the event. [!code-xaml[ControlProps_snip#ControlEvents11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#controlevents11)] 下面的示例演示事件的事件处理程序 。The following example shows the event handler of the event. [!code-csharp[ControlProps_snip#ControlEvents1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#controlevents1)] [!code-vb[ControlProps_snip#ControlEvents1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps_snip/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#controlevents1)]

span.span: The old template.
The new template.

summary.span: 在控件模板发生更改时调用。

span.span: Called whenever the control's template changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更改模板的计时如下：The timing for changing the template is as follows: 1. 方法调用、样式触发器或其他一些方法会更改模板。The template is changed by a method call, a style trigger, or some other means. 2. 属性值更改;将调用属性更改的回调。The property value changes; the property-changed callback is called. 3. 旧的可视化树将被删除。The old visual tree is removed. 4. 调用的内部方法最终将调用 方法。An internal method is called which eventually calls the method. 5. 稍后，在度量值过程中， 将调用并附加新的可视化树。Later, during a measure, is called and a new visual tree is attached.

summary.span: 获取或设置控件内部的填充边距。

span.span: Gets or sets the padding inside a control.

value.span: 的内容与其 或 之间的空间量。

span.span: The amount of space between the content of a and its or .

value.span: 默认情况下，所有四个边的宽度为 0。

span.span: The default is a thickness of 0 on all four sides.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 填充顺序按左、上、右和下顺序指定。Padding is specified in the order Left, Top, Right, and Bottom. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [对齐方式、边距和填充概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/alignment-margins-and-padding-overview)。For more information, see and [Alignment, Margins, and Padding Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/alignment-margins-and-padding-overview). 此属性仅影响其模板使用 属性作为参数的控件。This property only affects a control whose template uses the property as a parameter. 在其他控件上，此属性不会有任何影响。On other controls, this property has no impact. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置控件的填充属性。The following example shows how to set the padding property of a control. [!code-xaml[ControlProps_snip#AdditionalControlProps13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#additionalcontrolprops13)] [!code-csharp[ControlProps_snip#AdditionalControlProps3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#additionalcontrolprops3)] [!code-vb[ControlProps_snip#AdditionalControlProps3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps_snip/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#additionalcontrolprops3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管此路由事件似乎是通过元素树跟踪隧道路由，但实际上它是一个直接路由事件，每个事件都由元素树逐个引发 。Although this routed event seems to follow a tunneling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised along the element tree by each . 如果 在事件处理程序中将属性设置为，则将 `true` 在 设置为的情况下发生沿路由的后续事件 `false` ，但在设置为的情况下 将发生事件 `true` 。If you set the property to `true` in a event handler, subsequent events along the route will occur with set to `false`, but the event will occur with set to `true`. 这是控件使用者的高级事件，当用户双击控件并处理应用程序中的事件时，这些用户希望获得通知。This is a higher-level event for control consumers who want to be notified when the user double-clicks the control and to handle the event in an application. 当等于2时，要处理鼠标双击的控件作者应使用该事件 。Control authors who want to handle mouse double clicks should use the event when is equal to two. 这将导致的状态 在元素树中的另一个元素处理事件时适当地传播。This will cause the state of to propagate appropriately in the case where another element in the element tree handles the event. 类定义 和 事件，而不是对应的单击事件。The class defines the and events, but not corresponding single-click events. 若要查看用户是否已单击该控件一次，请处理该 事件 (或其对应的) 之一，并检查 属性值是否为1。To see if the user has clicked the control once, handle the event (or one of its counterparts) and check whether the property value is 1. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |委托Delegate|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将事件处理程序附加到 事件。The following example shows how to attach an event handler the event. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值决定在用户使用 Tab 键在控件中导航时元素接收焦点的顺序。

value.span: 决定设备的逻辑导航顺序的值。

span.span: A value that determines the order of logical navigation for a device.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Tab 键索引较低的控件比索引较高的控件先获得焦点。A control with a lower tab index receives focus before a control with a higher index. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例设置了三个按钮的选项卡索引。The following example sets the tab index of three buttons. span.span: Gets or sets a control template.
The template that defines the appearance of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的外观 ; 如果没有，则 将不会出现在你的应用程序中。The specifies the appearance of a ; if a does not have a , the will not appear in your application. 控件作者定义默认控件模板，应用程序作者可以重写 来重新定义控件的可视化树。The control author defines the default control template, and the application author can override the to redefine the visual tree of the control. 有关如何更改现有控件的可视化树的信息和示例，请参阅 [控件样式和模板](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/control-styles-and-templates) 。See [Control Styles and Templates](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/control-styles-and-templates) for information and examples of how to change the visual tree of existing controls. 旨在作为实现详细信息的自包含单元，该单元对外部用户和对象（包括对象）不可见 。A is intended to be a self-contained unit of implementation detail that is invisible to outside users and objects, including objects. 操作控件模板内容的唯一方法是在同一控件模板中。The only way to manipulate the content of the control template is from within the same control template. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例为创建一个 。The following example creates a for a . 如果将此项作为资源添加到应用程序中，应用程序中的所有按钮都将显示为省略号，但仍可用作按钮。If you add this to your application as a resource, all the buttons in the application will appear as ellipses but will still function as buttons. [!code-xaml[StylingIntroSample_snippet#ButtonCT](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylingIntroSample_snippet/CSharp/Window1.xaml#buttonct)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了 、和以外 ，还可以将 属性设置为 ，这会拉伸子元素以填充父元素的已分配布局空间。In addition to , , and , you can set the property to , which stretches the child element to fill the allocated layout space of the parent element. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [对齐、边距和填充概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/alignment-margins-and-padding-overview)。For more information, see [Alignment, Margins, and Padding Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/alignment-margins-and-padding-overview). 此属性仅影响其模板使用 属性作为参数的控件。This property only affects a control whose template uses the property as a parameter. 在其他控件上，此属性不会有任何影响。On other controls, this property has no impact. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在控件上设置垂直内容对齐方式属性。The following example shows how to set the vertical content alignment property on a control.
